name: execute_command
description: Execute a command on a specific enterprise-managed device.

device_id.description: The unique identifier for the device within the enterprise, e.g., `CAM_001`.

project_id.description: The unique identifier for the enterprise or project.

command_request.description: A dictionary containing the `command` name (string) to execute and optional `params` (dictionary) for command-specific arguments.

command.description: The name of the command to execute, selected from `sdm.devices.commands.generate_camera_event_image` (to retrieve an image from a triggered event), `sdm.devices.commands.generate_rtsp_stream` (to start RTSP stream mode), `sdm.devices.commands.stop_rtsp_stream` (to stop RTSP stream mode), `sdm.devices.commands.generate_image_from_rtsp_stream` (to retrieve an image from an ongoing RTSP stream), `sdm.devices.commands.generate_web_rtc_stream` (to start WebRTC stream mode), `sdm.devices.commands.stop_web_rtc_stream` (to stop WebRTC stream mode), or `sdm.devices.commands.generate_image_from_web_rtc_stream` (to retrieve an image from an ongoing WebRTC stream).

params.description: A dictionary of command-specific parameters with string values, such as `event_id` for `generate_camera_event_image` or `rtsp_url` for `generate_image_from_rtsp_stream`; use `None` if the command requires no parameters.

name: get_device_info
description: Retrieves authorized device information, including traits and parent relations.

device_id.description: The unique identifier of the device within the enterprise.

project_id.description: Unique identifier for the enterprise or project.

name: get_events_list
description: Return a list of triggered events, optionally filtered by device ID or event type.

device_id.description: An optional unique device identifier used to filter events; for example, "CAM_001".

event_type.description: Optional event type to filter events, accepting values like "Motion", "Person", "Sound", "Chime", or fully qualified names such as "sdm.devices.events.CameraMotion.Motion".

name: list_devices
description: Retrieves all devices authorized by the user for a given enterprise.

name: list_structures
description: List all structures authorized by the user for a given enterprise.
